Name: CUSTAM SUGOROKU
About the game: You need a friend for this game. There is a problem and the controller is now unsupported. --------------------------------------------------------- A game of dice where you can create your own inside. Create your own map and save it to a file. Load the saved file and play with others. Use the mouse and keyboard to create your own map. There are 12 kinds of events in the cells. You can enter the characters you want to display. You can play with up to 4 players in a local multi player game. How to operate mouse and keyboard Reset:F2 1P Decision: Z Up and down keys: Q/A 2P Decision: C Up and down keys: E/D 3P Decision: B Up and down keys: T/G 4P Decision: M Up and down keys: U/J
